result.markdown:
---
title: "Glue"
description: |
  Glue
author: Kevn Gilds, MPA
date: 2023-05-29
categories:
 -Glue
---


This is how I had to get the meta data to work on my new Post Add in.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# build yaml core
  new_post_core <- c(
    "---",
    glue::glue('title: "{title}"'),
    "description: |",
    glue::glue('  {description}'),
    glue::glue("author: {author}"),
    glue::glue("date: {date}"),
    glue::glue("categories:"),
    glue::glue(' -{categories}')

  )
```
:::
